bibl.title: Miscellaneous Texts from the Judaean Desert.
bibl.note: A. Ketef Jericho [Nos 1-19h = P. Jericho 1-19h.]. - B. Wadi Sdeir [Nos 1-4]. - C. Nahal Hever and Nahal Hever / Wadi Seiyal [Nos 1a-6]. - D. Nahal Mishmar [No. 2]. - E. Nahal Se'elim [Nos 2-5]. - F. Unknown Provenance [No. 1]. - Sections A-B and D-E include Greek texts. See pp. 247-250: Indices to the Greek Documentary Texts.
bibl.seg: CHARLESWORTH James, Nahum COHEN, Hannah COTTON, Esther ESHEL, Hanan ESHEL, Peter FLINT, Haggai MISGAV, Matthew MORGENSTERN, Katherine MURPHY, Michael SEGAL, Ada YARDENI and Boaz ZISSU, in consultation with James VANDERKAM and Monica BRADY, Miscellaneous Texts from the Judaean Desert. (Discoveries in the Judaean Desert. XXXVIII.)
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 2000, 4°, xviii-250 pp. et 26 figg. + 36 pll. ISBN 0-19-924261-5. £60.

A. Ketef Jericho [Nos 1-19h = P. Jericho 1-19h.]. - B. Wadi Sdeir [Nos 1-4]. - C. Nahal Hever and Nahal Hever / Wadi Seiyal [Nos 1a-6]. - D. Nahal Mishmar [No. 2]. - E. Nahal Se'elim [Nos 2-5]. - F. Unknown Provenance [No. 1]. - Sections A-B and D-E include Greek texts. See pp. 247-250: Indices to the Greek Documentary Texts.
Charlesworth Cohen Cotton Eshel Flint Misgav Morgenstern Murphy Segal Yardeni Zissu Vanderkam Brady
